articles.title: Trump’s media company says it’s buying $2.5 billion in Bitcoin
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s media company could soon own $2.5 billion in Bitcoin. On Tuesday, Trump Media announced that it’s working with “approximately 50 institutional investors” to sell and issue $1.5 billion in stock and $1 billion in convertible notes. The…
articles.content:
